sentence.Network_en: In one of the jolts, the whiffle - tree broke.
sentence.Network_cn: 车子落在一个坑里, 把车前拴挽带的那条横木震断了.

list.abs: ...，4日起将有一股冷空气影响北京，带来4级左右的偏北风，帮助吹散大雾，北京才可望摆脱大雾，重见明朗天。3. whiffle tree switch 横杆开关4. whiffle v.一阵阵吹,动摇不定,舞剑以发出呼呼声.

auth_sentence.content: The eagles whiffle like geese to lose height before extending their talons and snatching the fish off the water.
